column1: 16:40|4:40|Kaufman placed his hands together as if in prayer
column2: and when his prayer was answered
column4: “I’ll need to make a few phone calls before I come to a final decision
column5: so come back to my office at 4:40 tomorrow afternoon. If I’m convinced
column6: we’ll take it from there.”|Mightier Than the Sword|Jeffrey Archer

column1: 16:40|Four forty|Four forty P.M. Besta sang another hymn. Everyone knew something was wrong. How long did they wait? The mayor was going crazy inside
column3: as was their daughter. Seiji could barely contain his rage. He was turning as red as his red tuxedo.|Trouble & Triumph: A Novel of Power & Beauty|"Tip ""T.I."" Harris with David Ritz"
